item.title: Christmas List
item.description: Keep in mind that anything underlined is a clickable link. Without futher ado, here’s my Christmas list: iFixit Pro Tech Toolkit (from Amazon) [$70] Genesis Lockpick Set (from covertinstruments.com, quite the name, right?) [$25 + shipping] Pinecil (it’s a soldering iron) + a PinePower to power it + a cable for connecting them together [$54 + shipping] Shelley Plug US (from their website) [$12.
item.content:
Keep in mind that anything underlined is a clickable link. Without futher ado, here’s my Christmas list:

  • iFixit Pro Tech Toolkit (from Amazon) [$70]

  • Genesis Lockpick Set (from covertinstruments.com, quite the name, right?) [$25 + shipping]

  • Pinecil (it’s a soldering iron) + a PinePower to power it + a cable for connecting them together [$54 + shipping]

  • Shelley Plug US (from their website) [$12.75 + shipping]

  • GamersNexus merch of any type, I have one of their shirts in large (from their website)

  • Gift cards for Steam, or MOD

  • And of course, other stuff that I haven’t thought of yet.
